name: fast-array-diff
description: Implementation of paper 'An O(ND) Difference Algorithm and Its Variations' on array

scripts.clean: rm -rf dist; rm -rf coverage; rm -rf dist_map
scripts.coverage: tsc --sourceMap --outDir dist_map && istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- dist_map/test/*.spec.js
scripts.browserify: mkdir umd; browserify dist/index.js -s array-diff -o umd/array-diff.js
scripts.debug: npm run build && npm run test -- --debug-brk

author: Jianrong Yu <yujianrong@gmail.com>
